Name: Otiiz's adventure 2
About the game: Otiiz's Adventure 2 is a RPG card game. If you haven’t played before, it doesn’t affect the story of this game. Feel free to play. Recently, there have been frequent incidents in which villagers have been attacked by strange robots. Player can explore the town together with our protagonist, Otiiz. And discover the secrets of the town with the his friends, start the combat training to defend the town! The feature Special card fighting methods, you can choose to feed the opponent, or attack the opponent directly! Each character has a different plot to promote. In addition to fighting, there are some mini games can be played in story mode. After finish the story mode, the enemy characters can be used in the free combat mode.
